Name: treatment of used sealing tape, aluminium/PE, 50 mm wide | used sealing tape aluminium/PE, 50 mm wide | EN15804GD, U
Category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery
Description: Disposal to a sorting plant assumed. Metal pieces and copper in cables and electronic devices are recycled, plastic parts are incinerated, inert wastes (e.g. rock wool) are landfilled.
